#summary One-sentence summary of this page.

= 协议介绍 =
    FQueue的协议基于Memcached协议。
== 入队 ==
{{{
add queuename_password flags exptime <bytes>\r\n
<data block>\r\n
}}}
或者：
{{{
set queuename_password flags exptime <bytes>\r\n
<data block>\r\n
}}
== 出队 ==
{{{
get queuename_password\r\n
}}}
== 获取队列大小 ==
获取队列大小只需队列名，无需密码
{{{
get size|queuename\r\n
}}}
